post_message: UPDATE: Hillsborough County Clerk Pat Frank says the office is ready to issue same-sex marriage licenses Tuesday morning, and she has reserved the park across from the office for potential crowds. "I was hoping Judge Hinkle would revisit it and he's made it extremely clear now that it applies to every clerk in the state, that the ban against gay marriage is void...it never existed."
